release.notes:
Issued with a printed inner sleeve.
Ⓒ & Ⓟ 1984 Beggars Banquet Records, Ltd.
"Whisper To A Scream"  Ⓟ 1983 Situation 2
"Love Is A Wonderful Colour"  Ⓟ Beggars Banquet Records, Ltd.
Similar to the other US version ( https://www.discogs.com/Icicle-Works-Icicle-Works/release/8623540 ) but labels are different.
